name: MongoDB
description: Popular NoSQL document database with high performance and scalability.
author: StumpfWorks
compose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  mongodb:
    image: mongo:latest
    container_name: mongodb
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      - MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME={{MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME}}
      - MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD={{MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD}}
    ports:
      - "{{PORT}}:27017"
    volumes:
      - {{DATA_PATH}}:/data/db
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=mongodb"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=database"

notes: Change default credentials before production use
Use MongoDB Compass for GUI management
